tool_description: Creates formatted timestamps for journal entries with customizable date-time formats and timezone handling.

entry_date.description: Specific date for the entry in ISO format

format_style.description: Timestamp format style: ISO, readable, short, custom

include_seconds.description: Whether to include seconds in the timestamp

error_messages: Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ) for entry_date.
Unsupported timezone: Use a valid timezone identifier from the IANA timezone database.
Invalid format style: Use one of [ISO, readable, short, custom].
usage: Call without parameters to generate current timestamp, or provide entry_date for specific times. Set timezone and format_style to customize output format. Returns formatted timestamp ready for journal entry headers.

iso_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 standard timestamp for sorting and indexing

unix_timestamp.description: Unix epoch timestamp for programmatic use
